input:
SELECT e.id,
       json_extract(e.payload, '$.user.name') AS user_name,
       tags.value
FROM events e
JOIN json_each(e.tags) AS tags
WHERE json_type(e.payload, '$.active') = 'true';

outputs.expected: SELECT e.id, json_extract ( e.payload, ? ), tags.value FROM events e JOIN json_each ( e.tags ) WHERE json_type ( e.payload, ? ) = ?
